title: Tender for Supply of Epoetin Injection 2,000IU Prefilled Syringe 30,000 Syringes and Epoetin Injection 4,000IU - 5,000IU Prefilled Syringe 175,000 Syringes
decision_details:
-  the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above two tenders to the lowest responsive bidders as follows as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet:

*	Supply of Epoetin Injection 2,000IU Prefilled Syringe 30,000 Syringes at a total cost of US $37,500.00; and

*	Supply of Epoetin Injection 4,000IU - 5,000IU Prefilled Syringe 175,000 Syringes at a total cost of US $350,000.00.
